title: Serving Spoon
description: forms a set with .24, fork; oval to circular bowl, handle represents a stem and blooming flower; double band at 1/3 up from bowl; double v-shaped bands with beading below each one small and large just over halfway up handle; end is a single bud, band of beads over the end
creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
